text: allahara rahe yud'dha karate thakuna, apani nijera satta byatita an'ya kona bisayera yim'madara nana! Ara apani musalamanaderake utsahita karate thakuna. Sighra'i allaha kapheradera sakti-samartha kharba kare debena. Ara allaha sakti-samarthera dika diye atyanta kathora ebam kathina sastidata.
